name: hello-node
description: A simple Node app built on fastify, instantly up and running.

scripts.build: mkdir -p ~/bin && curl -L https://cpanmin.us/ -o ~/bin/cpanm && chmod +x ~/bin/cpanm && cpanm --local-lib=~/perl5 local::lib && eval $(perl -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/ -Mlocal::lib)
scripts.start: echo "perl environment: " ; perl -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/ -Mlocal::lib ; echo "user: " $(whoami) ; echo "working directory: " $(pwd) && ls -lah ; echo "perl packages: " ; dpkg --get-selections|grep -i perl ; which perl ; perl --version ; which cpanm 2>&1 ; node server.js
